alert.note: Alert for Blount; Jefferson; St. Clair (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 7:24PM CDT until August 09 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Blount County in central Alabama... Northeastern Jefferson County in central Alabama... West central St. Clair County in central Alabama... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 724 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near County Line, or 11 miles northeast of Gardendale, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springville, Odenville, Dallas, Clay, Pinson, Margaret, Argo, Kimberly, Locust Fork, Trafford, County Line, Inland Lake, Branchville, Palmerdale, St. Clair Springs, Holly Springs, Village Springs, Caldwell, Remlap and Clear Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
